description: Sample JSON structure for bulk uploading daily quizzes

quizzes.title: Science Quiz - Easy Level
quizzes.description: A fun science quiz for beginners covering basic concepts

questions.name: What is the chemical symbol for water?
Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
What is the largest organ in the human body?

quizzes.title: History Quiz - Medium Level
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of world history with this medium difficulty quiz

questions.name: In which year did World War II end?
Who was the first person to walk on the moon?

quizzes.title: Mathematics Quiz - Hard Level
quizzes.description: Challenge yourself with advanced mathematics problems

questions.name: What is the derivative of x^2 with respect to x?
What is the value of pi (Ï€) approximately?
questions.option4: All of the above are approximations
questions.answer: All of the above are approximations

quizzes.description: Array of quiz objects to upload

variable_score.description: Score points for completing this quiz

publish_date.description: Date when the quiz should be published (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

reward.description: Optional reward ID to associate with this quiz

name.description: The question text (must be between 20-100 characters)

answer.description: The correct answer (must match one of the options)

success.message: Bulk upload completed. X successful, Y failed out of Z total.

error.error: quizzes must be provided as an array in the request body

notes: All quizzes in the array will be created and published automatically
If one quiz fails, others will still be processed
The API returns detailed success and failure information for each quiz
publish_date should be in YYYY-MM-DD format
Question name must be between 20-100 characters
option3 and option4 are optional for questions
reward field is optional and should be a reward ID if provided
